details:
noun
- an unexpected omission
= example: an unexpected omission
- an act that fails
= example: an act that fails
- an event that does not accomplish its intended purpose
= example: an event that does not accomplish its intended purpose
- a person with a record of failing
= synonyms: nonstarter, loser, unsuccessful person
- loss of ability to function normally
= example: loss of ability to function normally
- lack of success
= example: lack of success
- inability to discharge all your debts as they come due
= synonyms: bankruptcy
